description: Three-candle bullish reversal pattern signaling potential end of downtrend. Consists of large bearish candle, small-bodied candle (star), and large bullish candle that closes well into first candle's body.
validationRules: First candle: Large bearish candle in downtrend
Second candle: Small body (any color) that gaps down
Third candle: Large bullish candle closing above midpoint of first candle
Gap down between first and second candle preferred
Gap up between second and third candle preferred
Third candle should have strong volume
invalidationSignals: Third candle fails to close above first candle's midpoint
commonMistakes: Expecting perfect gaps - they help but aren't mandatory
Ignoring the star candle color - can be bullish or bearish
Not waiting for volume confirmation on third candle
Trading pattern in consolidation instead of downtrend

tradeSetup.entry: Above third candle high or on pullback

conflicting: Downtrend still strong on higher timeframe
